item.title: Sample Ajax GET/POST Request in Django
item.description: Let us make a test scenario here: A dropdown field which on change we are going to send a Get/Post request to Django and return response. Let us start coding….|||||||||| HTML code <select id="select_dropdown"> <option value="joshua">joshua</option> <option value="peter">peter</option> .... .... </select> Create an Ajax request Let’s make an Ajax request after the change in the dropdown field.
